events.name: Lithium-ion Recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: Need for representative primary data and process simulations
events.wd_label: Need for representative primary data and process simulations
events.wd_description: There is a need for technology-specific and ore-grade-specific primary data to model representative supply chain configurations. If primary data is not available, process simulations can be used to acquire necessary data.
events.description: There is a need for technology-specific and ore-grade-specific primary data to model representative supply chain configurations. If primary data is not available, process simulations can be used to acquire necessary data.

events.name: Representative primary data
events.wd_description: Technology-specific and ore-grade-specific primary data is needed to model representative supply chain configurations.
events.description: Technology-specific and ore-grade-specific primary data is needed to model representative supply chain configurations.

events.name: Process simulations
events.wd_description: Process simulations can be used to acquire necessary data when primary data is not available.
events.description: Process simulations can be used to acquire necessary data when primary data is not available.

events.name: Technology variability
events.wd_description: Process simulations can consider the technology variabilities in nickel sulphate production.
events.description: Process simulations can consider the technology variabilities in nickel sulphate production.

events.name: Ore grade variability
events.wd_description: Process simulations can consider changes in ore grade of existing mining facilities.
events.description: Process simulations can consider changes in ore grade of existing mining facilities.

events.name: Analysis of nickel sulphate datasets in LCA studies
events.wd_label: Analysis of nickel sulphate datasets in LCA studies
events.wd_description: This study analyzes the production of nickel sulphate based on different datasets used in LCA studies. The variability in global warming potential (GWP100) and terrestrial acidification results is explored, along with the impact of energy mix and recycled nickel usage.
events.description: This study analyzes the production of nickel sulphate based on different datasets used in LCA studies. The variability in global warming potential (GWP100) and terrestrial acidification results is explored, along with the impact of energy mix and recycled nickel usage.

events.name: Nickel sulphate datasets
events.wd_description: Different datasets are used to analyze the production of nickel sulphate in LCA studies.
events.description: Different datasets are used to analyze the production of nickel sulphate in LCA studies.

events.name: GWP100 variability
events.wd_description: The GWP100 results of different nickel sulphate datasets vary significantly.
events.description: The GWP100 results of different nickel sulphate datasets vary significantly.

events.name: Terrestrial acidification variability
events.wd_description: The results for terrestrial acidification show even more variation between datasets than GWP100 results.
events.description: The results for terrestrial acidification show even more variation between datasets than GWP100 results.

events.name: Energy mix impact
events.wd_description: The energy mix used in the background datasets has a significant impact on GWP100 results but only a relatively small impact on terrestrial acidification results.
events.description: The energy mix used in the background datasets has a significant impact on GWP100 results but only a relatively small impact on terrestrial acidification results.

events.name: Recycled nickel usage
events.wd_description: The usage of recycled nickel also contributes to the variability in environmental impacts.
events.description: The usage of recycled nickel also contributes to the variability in environmental impacts.
